name: Monculi
description:
In the depths of a forgotten void, 9 men get mad at eachother.

-----------------------------------
"Monculi" is a 3D Arcade Platform fighter with a 2D artstyle. After the previous round's winner picks the stage every player runs, jumps, and punches until only one remains. After a round ends the losers get to select a card that will grant them upgrades or powerful abilities. Gameplay only ends when you get bored and turn it off, so enjoy the infinite potential that awaits you!


Currently only available on windows. Local multiplayer only (hopefully not for long ;) ).
